nodes.text: Jarg was a male Kaleesh mercenary in the service of Karagga the Hutt during the Cold War. He served as a bodyguard in Karagga's Palace where he was partnered with the Devaronian mercenary Sorno. When a strike team attacked the palace, Jarg and Sorno confronted them in the audience chamber. Though adept in combat, Jarg was killed.
Jarg, in conjunction with Sorno, serves as the second boss of Operation: Karagga's Palace in Star Wars: The Old Republic. This article assumes 100% game completion, so he was killed.
